## ConnectionType enum

Specifies how a specific connection to a device is established.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ConnectionType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  BLUETOOTH | <code>0</code> | A direct, bluetooth connection. |
|  INDIRECT | <code>1</code> | An indirect connection via a parent device, such as dongle. |
|  USB | <code>2</code> | A direct, USB connection. |
